ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron frowned, and his face turned into a hideous mask of rage as he screamed. NO, somehow the thrusters were dammaged in the landing. The ship will never

Megatron frowned, and his face turned into a hideous mask of rage as he
screamed. "NO, somehow the thrusters were dammaged in the landing. The
ship will never take off." he pointed his cannon at the nearest thing,
Switchblade, and was about to incinerate the Decepticon hacker. Just
then though, he had an idea. He turned around, and activated the main
laser cannon on the front of the ship. He looked throught the camera
with a smile, as they hummed to life.
______________________________________________________________________
Sea Gulls flew calmly over the ocean, but in seconds they scattered from
a nois, like hundreds of thunder bolts. A ray of intense heat emerged
from the Hudson bay, as the Dark Avian blasted it's finest weapon. Due
to not being ancored, the recoil caused the dark ship to fall back on
the cliff, and it began to teeter, then the weight of the ship, helped
with gravity began to plummet into the Hudson Bay. It landed with a huge
splash, sending a tital wave up, and towards the group of fighting
Decepticons who were on the beach.

Megatron stabalized himself. He turned to his troops. "I have buisness
to attend to, Switchblade, steer the ship to the location I talked to
you about earlier." with that, Megatron soared out of the floating ship,
and towards the Obylisk.
